reviews.name: Wise Boat Seat, Grey/Charcoal/Navy
reviews.reviewText: This is actually my second one to buy from wal mart. The boat i bought had two of these and two old seat so i was thrilled when i found that wal mart carried them. They are only rated for 250 pounds but feel very sturdy. They also have a really nice thick plastic frame underneath with holes and screws for mounting. I also bought a casting seat and post for bass fishing!
reviews.title: Great seat

reviews.name: Wise Boat Seat, Grey/Charcoal/Navy
reviews.reviewText: Great product, great price just installed in my bass boat , fished tournament pretty rough water they were way more comfortable than the old ones.thanks wal-mart ...great shipping also.
reviews.title: 06 August 2013

reviews.name: Wise Boat Seat, Grey/Charcoal/Navy
reviews.reviewText: Lowest price I could find for the boat seat up to 50% lower than some other online sellers. Beat the estimated delivery date by two (2) days which was a welcome surprise. Ordering was easy and the transaction was complete without a hitch. Should the need arise I would shop Walmart online again
reviews.title: Great buy, speedy delivery
